description: TiNegroni is the perfect cocktail for those who like light and stimulating drinks. This flavorful yet simple twist on a&nbsp;traditional Negroni has just enough kick to keep you coming back again and again!
name: TiNegroni
recipeIngredient: 1⁄2 oz. Punt e Mes sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine all the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until combined and chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well until combined and chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into shot glasses or preferred glassware.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into shot glasses or preferred glassware.
